name: Bass Ship
description:
You are a ship that has to dodge the bullets coming out of the black hole to the rhythm of the bass of your favorite music!

Features: 

- Play with your favorite music! (.mp3 format)

- Customize everything you want! (Colors, speed of the bullets, difficulty, etc.!)

-Change the background to your favorite image and apply effects and lateral movement!

- Do you just want to enjoy your music? Activate the player mode to listen to your music without distractions!

- English and Spanish language

Consider donating.
